branchCategory.name: NC(D)Q2KW-Z, Compact Cylinder, Double Acting, Double Rod, Non-rotating
branchCategory.description: Standard double acting, double non-rotating piston rod version of the NCQ2 compact cylinder. The NCQ2 is available in bore sizes from 12mm to 63mm. It comes standard with male or female piston rod threads. For mounting flexibility, it is possible to mount auto switches on any of the 4 surfaces.

breadCrumb.name: Compact, Dbl Act, Dbl Rod, Non-rotating
